Absolute values of partial orbital-orbital correlations for anti-bonding are usually larger than those for van der
Waals bonding. Bond overlaps are particularly small in the As1-As3 and As2-As4 van der Waals bonds.

SEM image of crystal aggregate of
-aresenic and the relationship between crystal morphology
and lattice axis. Comparison of crystal morphology with unit lattice and atomic arrangement.
crystals form as bladed crystals, which show parallel growth along the b-axis. Poor growth in the direction
perpendicular to the c-axis results in a thin plate shape. Because periodicity is short in the b-axis direction,
-arsenic crystals tends to elongate in this direction, and the crystals assume a bladed shape.
